name: ACCT_EB_LTFEE_HIST
description: This table holds the late fee history for a guarantor account.

columns.name: ACCT_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier for the guarantor record.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this record. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this record.

columns.name: LTF_HIST_APPLIED_D
columns.description: This item stores the date upon which the late fee was processed for this guarantor.  Each line in the related group is one instance of late fees being applied.

columns.name: LTF_HIST_PB_AMT
columns.description: Amount assessed for Professional Billing transactions for late fees

columns.name: LTF_HIST_HB_AMT
columns.description: The amount assessed for all hospital accounts for this particular late fee processing run.
